name: Auckland Scumbag University
description:
In pseudo-RPG format, Auckland Scumbag University is a willfully crappy treasure hunt about your quest to learn something at the terrible school of Auckland Game Design Uni. In this concrete and gib maze of unhelpful and underfunded education leaders, you will talk to local bothers and discover how well-off you could have been if you just decided to learn your game design skills self-taught. That's what you get for being born in New Zealand.

This is a short lampoon game made by 2019 Hindbodes in six days.

This is by far the most cutting game I've made leading up to now.
